title: Foam and a Microphone
description: On episode 235 of Sleep and Relax ASMR, we listen to the soothing sounds of different foam objects being tapped, cut, stroked, and dumped on various surfaces and textures. Enjoy! Follow us on Tingles: https://goo.gl/EV8K8L Thanks to Chris, Beth, Lori, and Heide for supporting the show (https://www.patreon.com/sleepandrelaxasmr) Donate: https://goo.gl/55Dj7k Email: Hello@SleepandRelaxASMR.com Thanks to Batchku, Sengjinn, Harveyjn, and Morgant for some of the great audio used this episode! --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app --- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/support
